100.title: Getting ripped
100.description: If you make enough lumber your arms will look like logs, too.

101.title: Axe lessons
101.description: You asked Jack for some advice with your axe handling. He simply told you to not use the blunt side, but the sharp one. You dummy...

102.title: Getting angry at Trees
102.description: You know they didn't do anything to you... You know they are good for the world... They look so green and peaceful... But when you get angry at them it's much easier to put them down with an axe!

200.title: Jack the Lumberjack
200.description: A big, bearded man walks out of the forest. He introduces himself as Jack and offers to help you with your wood production.

quote.text: For a moment I was really scared

200.effectDescription: Give Jack supplies to settle down and he'll produce wood for you.

201.title: Actual axe
201.description: Now your lumberjacks don't need to cut down trees with their hands anymore...

202.title: No more smoking breaks
202.description: After some issues with fire in dry woods, Jack put his foot down and forbid his workers to smoke during logging. It turns out they were massively slacking off before. There are even less injuries now. Who would have thought that swinging an axe with one hand (while the other one holds the cigarette) can be dangerous.

300.title: Get better at stone cutting...
300.description: If you hit harder more stones break of! Who would have thought?

301.title: The cookie fairytale
301.description: Someone told you that there is a perfect cookie hidden in one of the rocks around your town. You are going on a rampage looking for it.

302.title: Vibrant presence
302.description: You got a flair that makes the rocks shiver. They can feel you coming. They crumble when you get too close.

quote.text: Why is this happening to me?

400.title: Fred the stone cutter
400.description: One of Jack's helpers, Fred, seems to be more into rocks than trees. After Jack caught him hugging a large stone, he got fired... Couldn't you use a stone cutter?
400.effectDescription: Build a house for Fred and he'll produce stone for you.

401.title: The high note
401.description: Fred loves to sing while cutting stone. He just perfected the high notes. They make rock crumble into nice square stone blocks. What a mad skill...

402.title: Helicopter swing
402.description: One of Fred's workers - let's call him Tim - came up with a mad move to be faster at stone cutting. He swings his pickaxe in circles over his head with increasing speed until it buzzes. Then he just runs through rocks and cuts them all.

1000.title: Lucky bastard
1000.description: You found gold while mining stone! Now that you know what to look for, you should spot it more easily.
1000.effectDescription: You can now find gold more often while mining stone

1100.title: Spinach

quote.text: I'm strong to the finish, 'cause I eats me Spinach, I'm Popeye the sailor man! (toot, toot)

1100.effectDescription:
A steady supply of spinach for your town doubles all production and clicking!
In case you are wondering... all the stone is needed to pave the road from the spinach fields to your town.
